== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Jammy Jellyfish (22.04 LTS) for release in  <nowiki>[[https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/jammy-jellyfish-release-schedule/23906 | April, 2022]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta''' pre-release, you can see what we are testing in preparation for our next version.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

Please '''report your installation results''' on the <nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker|Release tracker]]</nowiki>.

General bug reporting guidelines can be found here: ReportingBugs

For Kubuntu, Ubuntu, and other flavours you can also take part in the testing week for the Beta. [|LINK HERE for info]].

== Getting Kubuntu 22.04 Beta ==

=== Upgrading from 21.10 or 20.04 ===

To upgrade to a Kubuntu 22.04 pre-release, run '''sudo do-release-upgrade -d''' from a command line.

=== Download a Disk Image ===

Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/22.04/beta/|Bootable image]]</nowiki>. Direct downloads, torrents, and zysnc are available as options.

== New features and changes in 22.04 Beta ==
=== Core desktop and applications ===

==== Plasma 5.24: simple by default, powerful when needed ====

<nowiki>[[File:JammyPlasma.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[https://kde.org/announcements/plasma/5/5.24.0/|Plasma 5.24]]</nowiki> has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup.

==== KDE Apps updates, including KDE Gear 21.12 and other updated apps ====

<nowiki>[[File:JammyApps.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

==== Web browser and office suite ====

* <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/98.0/releasenotes//|Firefox 98]]</nowiki> snap is the default browser.
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/ReleaseNotes/7.3|LibreOffice 7.3]]</nowiki> is provided by default in the full installation.

==== Qt ====

Kubuntu 22.04 Beta ships with Qt 5.15.2. Update to 5.15.3 is expected soon after the beta release.

== Other highlights/notes ==

=== Plasma Wayland session ===

* A Plasma Wayland session is available for testing by installing the plasma-workspace-wayland package, but is not supported. A Wayland session can then be started by selecting it at the login screen.
